p: To a stirred solution of alcohol 14 (3.5 g, 4.6 mmol) in MeCN (30 mL) were added N, N-dimethyl-4-aminopyridine (DMAP) (1.1 g, 9.2 mmol) and O-phenyl carbonochloridothioate (635 μL, 4.6 mmol) at 0 °C. After stirring for 21 h, the reaction mixture was concentrated under reduced pressure. The resulting residue was purified by silica gel column chromatography to afford thiocarbonate 15 (2.6 g, 63%) as a colorless oil. 15: Colorless oil; R f 0.6 (hexane/EtOAc = 1/2); [α] D 21 −63.8 ( c 0.52, CHCl 3); 1H-NMR (600 MHz, CDCl 3), δ in ppm 8.15 (s, 1H), 7.91 (s, 1H), 7.67–7.63 (m, 4H), 7.43-7.39 (m, 2H), 7.37–7.28 (m, 9H), 6.91 (d, J = 8.3 Hz, 2H), 6.87 (d, J = 8.7 Hz, 2H), 6.47 (dd, J = 5.9, 5.3 Hz, 1H), 6.41 (d, J = 5.3 Hz, 1H), 5.49 (brs, 2H), 5.11 (d, J = 5.9 Hz, 1H), 4.87 (d, J = 11.0 Hz, 1H), 4.64 (d, J = 11.0 Hz, 1H), 4.11 (d, J = 11.2 Hz, 1H), 3.86 (d, J = 11.2 Hz, 1H), 3.81 (s, 3H), 1.03 (s, 9H), 0.97 (t, J = 7.9 Hz, 9H), 0.61 (q, J = 7.9 Hz, 6H); 13C-NMR (150 MHz, CDCl 3) δ C 194.3, 159.3, 155.3, 153.4, 153.3, 149.9, 140.1, 135.64 (2C), 135.61 (2C), 132.6 (2C), 129.9, 129.81, 129.80, 129.6 (2C), 129.5 (2C), 127.75 (2C), 127.73 (2C), 126.6, 121.7 (2C), 120.2, 113.7 (2C), 101.8, 92.2, 86.2, 83.6, 80.6, 76.2, 73.8, 66.6, 55.3, 26.8 (3C), 19.2, 7.4 (3C), 4.2 (3C); IR ν max (film) 3315, 2956, 2171, 1643, 1105, 1009 cm −1; HRMS (ESI) m/ z = calcd 922.3460 [M + Na] +, found 922.3451 [M + Na] +.
